name: Laptop Pro 15
description: A powerful laptop with an Intel i7 processor, 16GB RAM, and a 512GB SSD.

name: Wireless Headphones
description: Noise-cancelling wireless headphones with over 30 hours of battery life.

name: Smartwatch 3
description: A sleek smartwatch with flitness tracking, heart rate monitor, and a 2-day battery life.

name: Tablet S8
description: A lightweight tablet with a 10.5-inch screen and 64GB of internal storage.

name: Bluetooth Speaker
description: Portable Bluetooth speaker with high-quality sound and 12 hours of battery life.

name: 4K TV 55"
description: A 55-inch 4K Ultra HD television with HDR support and smart features.

name: Gaming Console X100
description: Next-gen gaming console with 1TB of storage and support for 4K gaming.

name: Smart Bulbs (Pack of 2)
description: A pair of smart bulbs that can be controlled via your smartphone or voice assistant.

name: Electric Scooter
description: An eco-friendly electric scooter with a top speed of 15 mph and a range of 25 miles.

name: Instant Camera
description: Instant film camera with a built-in flash and a variety of color filters.

name: VR Headset Pro
description: Virtual reality headset with high-definition display and immersive 360-degree experience.

name: Portable Power Bank
description: A 10,000mAh portable power bank for charging your devices on the go.

name: Drone X300
description: A high-tech drone with a 4K camera and a 30-minute battery life.
